item.description:
Of course there is no one single conservative perspective on issues. We debate, we listen, we learn. This is a good meeting for friendly discussion. The people who come are bright, lucid, open, and forthright. Some people are more politically active than others. There's no specific political activity requirement and there is no partisan angle.

We look forward to having new members come. Discussion is interesting, please bring your views, your self.

Fourth Monday of each month, at varying locations. This month at Cottonwood Cafe, Berkeley at St. James. in the Back Bay. Weather permitting, we will be at an outside table. The topic this month will be books: what books on politics or political philosphy have been meannigful to you, either classics or recent titles. Has anyone read "The Obahma Nation"?


Thurman Smith, organizer
781-388-9386
Cell Aug 25th 6:00 to 7:15 pm only 781-571-3740
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the maitre d' for the meetup table
item.name: Boston Conservatives' August Meetup
